name: SIDANET
description:
HOW TO PLAY

You have to click on asteroids before they touch the Planet. But be careful : everytime you're not on a side, that side speeds up so you will have to switch sides very often :)

CREDITS

Every assets I used are either made by me or by someone that shared it under the CC0 law (no copyright / royalty free / modification allowed) which allows me to modify and shares my work with you.

Space Background : https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator

Planet : https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator

Songs : https://opengameart.org/content/space-cadet-training-montage

                https://opengameart.org/content/unfinishedscrapseven-less-good-tracks
